description: {"blocks":[{"key":"dk9or","text":"This protocol describes the steps to prepare imaging medium for Saccharomyces cerevisiae with adjusted refractive index. This medium is optimized for fluorescence imaging by the reduction of auto-fluorescence through an abundance of Adenine [1] and the repression of of the Met-promoted pp7- CP expression [2].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Any action you take or refrain from taking using or relying upon the information presented here is strictly at your own risk. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}

steps.section: Preparation of 30ml refractive index adjusted imaging medium with Sorbitol

cases.title: Medium preparation with pre-resolved components
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6tpu5","text":"This version of the protocol shows the preparation of the medium from SC-XX 10x and YNB 20x solutions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: Medium preparation from powders
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ehe2v","text":"Medium preparation from powders In this version of the protocol the medium is prepared by weighting the SC and YNB powders and resolving them in the medium flask.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
